item.description:
It's nearly here.  Make your reservation now.

We will meet for fun and good food at Maritime Grille on the Post Road in Guilford. 

11:30 to 1:30pm

The price is $21per person.

We need your lunch selection and check payable to Maritime Grille by Dec 6.  Drop off or mail to Patti Urban at Comfort Keepers, 722 Village Walk, Guilford, CT 06437.

If you RSVP with Meetup you still need to drop your check off at Comfort Keepers by December 6th!

The price includes salad, choice of entree (chicken Parmesan, stuffed sole with lemon sauce or London broil with mushrooms/onions), dessert, coffee, and soda.

Cash bar. 

If you are a vegetarian please let us know in advance, we can preorder separate dishes for you.

 

Hope to see you there.

Your Leadership Team.
item.name: AWBL Holiday Lunch
